description: Learn how to make a deliciously easy bread and butter pudding with this no-fuss recipe. Simple ingredients are all you need to create this standout dessert.
name: Blueberry Bread & Butter Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scatter over blueberries and bake for 40 minutes or until golden and custard is set. Dust with icing sugar and serve with cream.
